definitions: the action or practice of playing gambling games

examples.text: gaming is evident everywhere in Las Vegas, not just on the Strip
US states are already moving to regulate online gaming
thousands of people flock to these gaming establishments every year

shortDefinitions: action or practice of playing gambling games

definitions: the action or practice of playing video games

examples.text: I'm fourteen years old and enjoy gaming and playing baseball
smooth animations and tastefully designed graphics make for an effortless gaming experience

shortDefinitions: action or practice of playing video games
